abilities.desc: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence.
abilities.name: Arcane Bolt

abilities.desc: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.
abilities.name: Concussive Shot
abilities.notes: Provides 400 vision around the projectile, and reveals the target area for 3.34 seconds upon impact.

abilities.desc: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.
abilities.name: Ancient Seal
abilities.notes: The magic damage resistance reduction doesn't affect creeps.

abilities.desc: Every time Skywrath Mage deals magic damage to an enemy hero with an ability, he gains a buff that grants bonus Intelligence and Armor. Each cast stacks independently.
abilities.name: Shield of the Scion

abilities.desc: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2.2 seconds.
abilities.name: Mystic Flare
abilities.notes: Mystic Flare will damage enemy creeps if no enemy heroes are present.
